resources.string:
The Internet can be kinda creepy.

Not to worry! Searching and browsing privately is easier than you think.

Try visiting one of your favorite sites!

I\'ll block trackers so they can\'t spy on you. I\'ll also upgrade the security of your connection if possible. ðŸ”’

You\'ve got this!

Remember: every time you browse with me a creepy ad loses its wings. ðŸ‘
Your DuckDuckGo searches are anonymous and I never store your search history. Ever. ðŸ™Œ

Every site has a privacy grade. Tap it to see how I protected your privacy.

Want to get fancy? Try clearing your data by hitting the fire button.

Heads up!

%s runs a major tracking network.

A low privacy grade will tip you off to sites like this.

Heads up!

%s is owned by %s, which runs a major tracking network.
In fact, %s trackers lurk on about %s of top sites. ðŸ˜±
In fact, %s trackers lurk all over the internet. ðŸ˜±
